Inikah Penyebab Garuda dan Sriwijaya 'Cerai' Kedua Kalinya?
07 Nov 2019, 08:03 by Danang Sugianto


Foto: detikFoto

Jakarta - Hubungan PT Garuda Indonesia Tbk dan PT Sriwijaya Air kembali merenggang. Pihak Garuda Indonesia resmi mengumumkan keluarnya Sriwijaya Air dari grup perusahaan.Informasi itu terkuak melalui pesan berantai Direktur Pemeliharaan & Layanan Garuda Indonesia, Iwan Joeniarto. Dia selain mengirimkan informasi keluarnya Sriwijaya Air juga mengumumkan instruksi operasional.Dalam instruksi itu dijelaskan mengenai delay untuk beberapa penerbangan Sriwijaya Air. Delay itu berpotensi batalnya penerbangan lantaran Gapura tak lagi melayani Sriwijaya dan NAM.Penyebab berhentinya layanan itu lantaran belum dipenuhinya kewajiban transfer top up cash basis oleh Sriwijaya Air.Direktur Teknik Sriwijaya Air Romdani Ardali Adang pun membenarkan isi instruksi operasional tersebut. Namun dia belum membenarkan penyebab renggangnya hubungan Garuda Indonesia dengan Garuda lantaran belum dipenuhinya transfer top up cash basis kepada Gapura."Ke Bu Maya saja ya," ujarnya singkat kepada detikcom melalui pesan singkat, Kamis (7/11/2019).Hubungan maskapai Badan Usaha Milik Negara (BUMN) PT Garuda Indonesia (Persero) dan PT Sriwijaya Air kembali retak. Hal itu terkuak melalui pesan berantai Direktur Pemeliharaan & Layanan Garuda Indonesia, Iwan Joeniarto.Pesan itu mengacu hubungan kerja sama manajemen antara Sriwijaya Air dan PT Citilink Indonesia yakni anak usaha Garuda Indonesia. Dijelaskan, karena keadaan dan beberapa hal yang belum diselesaikan oleh kedua pihak maka Sriwijaya Air melanjutkan bisnis sendiri."Dengan demikian, Sriwijaya tidak akan lagi menjadi anggota Garuda Indonesia Group," bunyi pesan itu.Simak Video "Garuda Indonesia Larang Penumpang Bawa MacBook Pro 15 Inci"[Gambas:Video 20detik](fdl/fdl)

Is this the Cause of Garuda and Sriwijaya 'Divorced' Second Time?
Nov 7 2019, 08:03 by Danang Sugianto


Photo: detikPhoto

Jakarta - The relationship between PT Garuda Indonesia Tbk and PT Sriwijaya Air has resumed. Garuda Indonesia has officially announced the departure of Sriwijaya Air from the company group. The information was revealed through a chain message from Garuda Indonesia Maintenance & Service Director Iwan Joeniarto. In addition to sending out Sriwijaya Air's exit information, he also announced operational instructions. The instructions explained about delays for several Sriwijaya Air flights. The delay has the potential of canceling flights because Archway no longer serves Sriwijaya and NAM. The cause of the cessation of the service was because the Sriwijaya Air's top-up cash basis transfer requirement had not been fulfilled. Sriwijaya Air Technical Director Romdani Ardali Adang also confirmed the contents of the operational instructions. But he has not justified the cause of the loosening of Garuda Indonesia's relationship with Garuda because the top-up cash base transfer has not been fulfilled to Gapura. "To Mrs. Maya, yes," he said briefly to AFP via text message on Thursday (11/07/2019). The state-owned enterprises (BUMN) of PT Garuda Indonesia (Persero) and PT Sriwijaya Air have cracked again. This was revealed through a chain message from Garuda Indonesia Maintenance & Service Director Iwan Joeniarto. The message referred to the management cooperation relationship between Sriwijaya Air and PT Citilink Indonesia, a subsidiary of Garuda Indonesia. Explained, because of the situation and several things that had not been resolved by both parties, Sriwijaya Air continued its own business. "Thus, Sriwijaya will no longer be a member of the Garuda Indonesia Group," the message reads.
